trans-unit.source: PID for poiCollections: Define a storage pid where to store records of type Point of Interest.
trans-unit.target: PID for poiCollections: Define a storage pid where to store records of type Point of Interest.

trans-unit.source: Link to edit view: Set the URI where the frontend user can edit his business listings.
trans-unit.target: Link to edit view: Set the URI where the frontend user can edit his business listings.

trans-unit.source: Email address FROM: The senders email address. If not given the extension tries to get one from INSTALL_TOOL.
trans-unit.target: Email address FROM: The senders email address. If not given the extension tries to get one from INSTALL_TOOL.

trans-unit.source: Sender name FROM: The senders email name. If not given the extension tries to get one from INSTALL_TOOL.
trans-unit.target: Sender name FROM: The senders email name. If not given the extension tries to get one from INSTALL_TOOL.

trans-unit.source: Email address TO: The recipients email address.
trans-unit.target: Email address TO: The recipients email address.

trans-unit.source: Recipient name TO: The recipients email name.
trans-unit.target: Recipient name TO: The recipients email name.
